name: AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer
desc: A type that transforms an attribute by altering its range or value, or by replacing it entirely.

items.name: var range: Range<AttributedString.Index>
items.desc: The range of the attribute in the attributed string.

items.name: func replace<U>(with: U.Type, value: U.Value)
items.desc: Replaces an attribute with a different attribute.

items.name: func replace<U>(with: KeyPath<AttributeDynamicLookup, U>, value: U.Value)
items.desc: Replaces an attribute with a different attribute that a key path identifies.
